titleStmt.title: A Tory plot, or, The discovery of a design carried on by our late addressers and abhorrers, to alter the constitution of the government and to betray the Protestant religion by Philanax Misopappas.
titleStmt.author: Misopapas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N.L., to be sold by Richard Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Imperfect: The Tory plot, the second part ([4], 32 p.) with special t.p. and separate pagination is lacking in filmed copy.
